metadata.title: CVE-2015-8879 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: The odbc_bindcols function in ext/odbc/php_odbc.c in PHP before 5.6.12mishandles driver behavior for SQL_WVARCHAR columns, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) in opportunisticcircumstances by leveraging use of the odbc_fetch_array function to accessa certain type of Microsoft SQL Server table.

criterions.comment: php5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
